${ModID}:LoneTableCutscene.NAME: Lone Table
BLOCKING_TEXTS: You've had enough gambling for now.
You don't need to gamble anymore.
In an attempt to ease your unyielding urge to gamble, you try to look for a distraction, but your eyes just can't leave the table...
Such beautiful craftsmanship. You've never seen a table this elegant before.
Full disclosure, that was a joke. That table is putrid.
It's as if the designer of the table spent a whopping 5 seconds in Photoshop making it.
There are no Easter Eggs up here. Go away.
DESCRIPTIONS: You see a lone table. It is ~suspiciously~ empty...
~"HEHEHEHE!"~ A small gremlin seems to materialize out of nowhere, shuffling cards with surprising dexterity.
"Care for a game of Match and Keep? I've got ALL kinds of cards ready..."
"Ah, playing it safe, eh? Fair enough! Pick your stakes..."
"OOH! Feeling lucky? The @zanier@ cards are half off! What'll it be?"
